function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid urbanization leading to a growing number of slum dwellers and inadequate infrastructure and services","Impact":"Worsening air pollution, unplanned urban sprawl, and increased risk of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Investment in sustainable and inclusive urban development, improved infrastructure and services, and urban planning","Technologies":"Smart city technologies, sustainable construction materials, urban data analytics","People":"Slum dwellers, urban residents, and city workers","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners, and construction companies"},{"Description":"Introduction of new technologies and communication infrastructure","Impact":"Rapid technological changes may lead to challenges in adaptation, digital divide, and data security risks","Mitigation":"Investment in digital literacy and education, equitable access to technology, and cybersecurity measures","Technologies":"5G technology, digital literacy programs, cybersecurity software","People":"Global population, online users, and communication industry workers","Owner":"Technology companies, governments, and educational institutions"}]}
